text: Kaya tumhi (kamavasana purtikarita) purusanjavala yeta, ani vatamara karatata ani apalya ama sabhamadhye nirlajjatece kama karata? Tevha tyacya uttaradakhala tyancya janasamuhane yakherija dusare kahi sangitale nahi ki pure kara, jara sacca ahesa tara amacyavara allahaca azaba (siksa) anuna dakhava
